meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jamie Campbell Steven Chinn Bruce Seymour Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #771.

td.p: Jamie Campbell, a secretary originally from Texas
Steven Chinn, an attorney originally from London, England
Bruce Seymour, a writer from Piedmont, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $29,989)

tr.td: NEVADA
NAMES
NUMBERS IN SONG
BUSINESS & INDUSTRY
SHAKESPEARE
BACK TO THE BEACH

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_4_1', 'clue_J_4_1_stuck', '(Jamie: What is American Motors company?)

American Motors (AMC)

Jamie
')

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_6_4', 'clue_J_6_4_stuck', 'Heard here, he sang the following in the film:

"Well everybody\'s heard about the bird! /
Bird, bird, bird, well, the bird is the word! /
Well, the bird, bird, bird, the bird is the word..."')

Heard here, he sang the following in the film:
"Well everybody's heard about the bird! /
Bird, bird, bird, well, the bird is the word! /
Well, the bird, bird, bird, the bird is the word..."

(Bruce: It was close. It was close.)
(Alex: It was close. All right. You\'ve got $4,900 and you select again.)

Lyndon Johnson & Richard Nixon (& Herbert Hoover)

Bruce
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Bruce
Steven
Jamie
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: There were a lot of stares on that Final Jeopardy!, I must say.)
...
(Alex: [To Steven] You couldn\'t come up with the television show, either. All right. I say "either" because I noticed our champion, uh... didn\'t write too much.)
...
(Alex: [To Jamie] You\'re absolutely right. That is the show. There are very few variety shows still left in production. [*] is in syndication, as you know.)
StevenWhat What is ?
$800
JamieWhat is Hee Haw?
$2,000
BruceWhat is ?
$2,500
Hee Haw')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This variety show that replaced the Smothers Brothers on CBS 20 years ago is still in production')

tr.td: TELEVISION HISTORY
This variety show that replaced the Smothers Brothers on CBS 20 years ago is still in production
Bruce
Steven
Jamie
3-day champion: $39,989
3rd place: a Litton microwave oven
2nd place: a Broyhill oak rolltop desk and matching chair + a Smith Corona XD 6700 portable electronic typewriter
Bruce
Steven
Jamie

25 R
(including 1 DD),
0 W

9 R,
2 W

13 R
(including 1 DD),
4 W
(including 1 DD)
